DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess activity buprenorphine hydrochloride ( HCl ) buccal film treatment dental pain .
DOC.brief_title: Study Buprenorphine HCl Buccal Film Treatment Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: extraction 2 third molar , least 1 must fully partially impacted mandibular bone male nonpregnant female , age 18 45 year good general health capable providing informed consent history substance abuse dependence positive urine toxicology screen alcohol breath test history hypersensitivity allergy study drug donation blood within prior 30 day use analgesic , caffeine , sedative , antidepressant , anticoagulant antiplatelet agent within 24 hour
